charleston.neighborhoods: Downtown, Kanawha City, South Hills, Edgewood
charleston.meetingHighlights: Strong downtown and neighborhood meetings with regular speaker nights and recovery workshops.
charleston.transitInfo: KANAWHA Valley regional buses and easy highway access via I-64 and I-77; most attendees drive locally.

huntington.neighborhoods: Downtown, Central Huntington, Guyandotte, Ritter Park
huntington.meetingHighlights: University-area and downtown evening meetings with active newcomer-focused groups and outreach events.
huntington.transitInfo: Mountain Line Transit provides local bus service; regional highways connect to Huntington-Ashland metro area.

morgantown.meetingHighlights: Active college-town meetings at varied times to serve students and local residents; strong lunchtime options.
morgantown.transitInfo: Morgantown Personal Rapid Transit (PRT) and Mountain Line buses provide local coverage; short drives to nearby towns.

wheeling.neighborhoods: Wheeling Island, Centre Market, Oak Park
wheeling.meetingHighlights: Community-based evening meetings and regular speaker events; steady participation from nearby small towns.
wheeling.transitInfo: Local bus service and proximity to I-70 provide regional access; some attendees cross state lines to Ohio and Pennsylvania.

parkersburg.meetingHighlights: Evening and weekend meetings with a mix of faith-based and community sponsor groups.
parkersburg.transitInfo: Local bus services and regional highways provide access; nearby Mid-Ohio Valley airport and river transport for regional travel.
